title: Calories in a Flan
meta_description: Discover calories in a flan, including full nutrition breakdown per serving, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard caramel custard flan, one serving (about 100g), baked with eggs, milk, sugar, and caramel topping.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, portion size, ingredients, and preparation method. Check labels or recipes for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One serving of flan provides about 180 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Low-fat milk version (reduce fat by half)

faqs.q: How many calories in a serving of flan?
faqs.a: About 180 kcal per 100g serving of standard caramel flan.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a flan?
faqs.a: One serving has around 25g carbs, mostly from sugar.
No, only about 4g protein per serving from eggs and milk.

faqs.q: How does flan compare to other desserts calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Similar to pudding or custard; lower than cheesecake but higher than fruit-based options.

faqs.q: Can I make flan lower in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, use low-fat milk, reduce sugar, or opt for smaller portions to cut calories.
